oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Uncle Zeb postcard
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Caption on back: “1910. William, Uncle Zeb loading his wagon for market in Sevierville last week. They bilt them wooden boxes krates(?) out of the oak he makes his baskets from. He sells on the road.” 1 p RPPC (Real photo postcard).
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Postcards; Carts & wagons; Horses; Crates;
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: For information on license and use fees and acquiring high-resolution image files, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8814.
